attributes.action: improve the frequency of public transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please increase the frequency of public transport.

Just one extra train an hour, and one extra bus an hour will make a big difference.
Please arrange for school buses - this will stop parents  having to use their cars to drop their children off at school, and reduce the extra cars on the road.


There is no space to even get on to the trains now.
We have to wait for a long time in bad weather at bus stops.

No one wants to use the car, if public transport is available more frequently and if you can get onto the trains and buses.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
